mapper.insert: insert into user_tb values(0, #{userUsername}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select ut.user_id, ut.user_username, ut.user_password, ut.user_name, ut.user_phone, ut.user_email, ut.create_date, ut.update_date, rrt.role_register_id, rrt.role_id, rt.role_name, rt.role_name_kor from user_tb ut left outer join role_register_tb rrt on(rrt.user_id = ut.user_id) left outer join role_tb rt on(rt.role_id = rrt.role_id) where ut.user_username = #{userUsername}
